meanings.definition: A Greek dish typically made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious mousaka for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: At the Greek restaurant, I ordered a plate of mousaka.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped the mousaka on the floor, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The layers of flavors in the mousaka danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked mousaka filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: I will mousaka the ingredients for our family gathering.
meanings.sent2: She loves to mousaka for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: While trying to mousaka, I realized I forgot the main ingredient.
meanings.sent4: He mousakaed the dish with precision, following the traditional recipe.
meanings.sent5: The chef will mousaka the mousaka for the food festival.
